website_summaries.verdict: This kettle maintains a steady temperature with even heat distribution for perfect results.
pros: Consists of a high grade stainless steel material, so it will stand up to regular use nicely
Contains a capacity of up to 10 gallons, so it’s the perfect size for home brewing
Cleanup doesn’t take very long afterward
cons: Placement of the spigot sometimes is off-center, causing issues

customer_reviews.title: This is a great brewing kettle for a great price - large
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brewing kettle for a great price - large, heavy duty, well made and good looking. It has the triclad bottom, a weldless ball valve down low on the pot (that came with a hose barb), instructions for assembling, and the gallon markers inside going by one half to 9. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Laack

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: A serious piece of brewing equipment! Just received my order so havent tested anything yet but the construction is heavy duty. Ive ordered several small brew kettles in this price range and this is by far the best. With its features i dont think you'll find a better value. Thick tri-ply bottom, deburred hole for valve, riveted handles, and etched measurements inside
customer_reviews.author: justin herr

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY recommend. Valve was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but will soon. This is a high quality kettle. DEFINITELY recommend. Valve was easy to assemble, tested for leaks with no issues. Contacted Coldbreak and received fast friendly help and feedback.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Kettle
customer_reviews.text: Good quality kettle. The induction ready bottom was the big seller for me. Works great with the Advantco IC3500 induction cook top and has no problem bringing 8 gallons to a boil. Added another port on top for recirculating beer thru my cooler. Probably will be adding a thermometer to it very soon also. It arrived in perfect shape and the packaging inside seemed to enough to protect it during normal shipping. I'd buy one again if i had to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but came with a dent.
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today. Took about 5-10 minuets to but it together. Had no leaks on my first try. Just use extra tape and make sure it’s tight. It’s a 10 gallon pot if it’s full to the rim. Perfect for what I need. Nice a thick happy with it, but it can with a dent free of charge. The packaging was great. I think it got shipped that way.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kettle for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kettle for the price. I will use it for my boil kettle when brewing beer.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Rust spots on the bottom.
customer_reviews.text: An update to my original review is required. After doing a little research I found out that rust spots are not uncommon. I purchased some BKF and cleaned the kettle in less than two minutes. The kettle looks great and I am bringing my mash water up to temp as I type.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great kettle
customer_reviews.text: Tested it out the other day and I really like this. I don't need a temperature gauge so one port is fine with me! Good solid base and it keeps it temperature really well.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Nice price.
customer_reviews.text: Slight rusting after first use. Cleaned with barkeeper's friend, rust gone. Nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE! THIS IS SUPPOSED TO COME WITH A SPIGOT INSTALLED AND IT DIDN'T! the only reason I bought this was because of the spigot, but it's just a regular kettle. I wouldn't give this one star.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great brew kettle at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking piece of equipment. Packaging was standard but more than enough to protect it dock to door. Heavy duty ball valve with a threaded port to accommodate the included barb. Good weight to the pot at 15 lbs. (empty) and the lid seats deep in the pot for a great seal. Height (16") is a good fit on the stove under the range hood if I want to use indoors. I would highly recommend for any home brewer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
